SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHARINDEX2
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets the 2nd or nth position of given string.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Mark Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
CREATE FUNCTION dbo.USR_UFN_CHARINDEX2 ( @TargetStr varchar(8000), @SearchedStr varchar(8000), @Occurrence int ) RETURNS int with execute as caller as begin declare @pos int, @counter int, @ret int
set @pos = CHARINDEX(@TargetStr, @SearchedStr) set @counter = 1
if @Occurrence = 1 set @ret = @pos else begin while (@counter < @Occurrence) begin select @ret = CHARINDEX(@TargetStr, @SearchedStr, @pos + 1) set @counter = @counter + 1 set @pos = @ret end end
RETURN(@ret) end
